About the job
    


          The Egencia Homepage team is seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our experienced team to build and evolve the home page of our product! Users land upon this experience after logging in and is a key opportunity to surface relevant information for their awareness as well as use our data to make the user’s intended task more efficient and effortless. This team also owns our travel advisory offering, which assists clients and travelers when navigating through the complexities of governments' travel advisories. The Homepage team’s scope of work spans front-end development through back-end services to their databases. We are looking for someone passionate about technology to apply best-in-class practices, creative problem-solving, and innovative thinking to our business problems!

Launched in 2002 as Expedia Corporate Travel, Egencia has become the world’s leading digital corporate travel platform because of our commitment to delivering a higher standard of corporate travel service and innovative technology. Our success is directly attributed to our customers' ability to move their businesses ahead, through their valued relationships with our company and more importantly, with our people. Lead by an experienced, forward-thinking management team, Egencia has continued to expand its offering of intuitive online tools and comprehensive agency services while maintaining its reputation for superior customer service.

What you’ll do:
Build relationships extending outside of your immediate team and collaborate with peers across the global organization. Guide integrations across teams within the business unit.Reliably conduct day-to-day work and solve sophisticated issues in your own specific technical engineering area. Advises on technical limitations of software design for products and provides alternative solutions.Bring together and integrate different components among applications, databases, and technology platforms to form a fully functional solution to a business problem. Research and recommend frameworks and architectural/code design patterns.Act as a spokesperson for software design best practices.Collaborate with varied partner roles like Product, Design, and Analytics to apply good business judgment to refine requirements so that they best address customer needs.Lead and mentor others on the team in their daily work and over their careers.Spot inefficiencies and technical debt within current systems and design and propose plans to evolve them in a non-disruptive manner.Report on the status of difficult or high-level projects to local tech leadership via written or oral means. Ensure documentation is complete.

8+ years of industry software development experienceBachelor's degree or Masters in a related Technical field; or equivalent related professional experience.Deep experience crafting performant web applications using Java, Kotlin, JavaScript, React, and Spring including new service design and API design.Solid familiarity with architectural components and their implementation trade-offs, such as data transport methods, Relational and NoSQL databases, messages queues, and data streams.Ability to identify business problems at the team level and design solutions that are easily testable and observable.Strong understanding of how team goals fit a business need.Able to justify and clearly communicate technology choices to technical and non-technical observers making well-defined technology choices.Able to understand highly complex systems and design moderately complex systems.Identifies and advocates for project quality via testing, monitoring, and alerting at the project level.
